```{r}
bshop <- st_read("https://opendata.dc.gov/datasets/books-and-barber-shops/explore?location=38.897907%2C-76.981231%2C13.02", 
                  quiet = TRUE) 

library <- st_read("https://opendata.dc.gov/datasets/libraries/explore?location=38.905806%2C-77.013376%2C12.65", 
                 quiet = TRUE)

food-access <- st_read("https://opendata.dc.gov/datasets/low-food-access-areas/explore?location=38.896624%2C-77.010328%2C12.59", 
                   quiet = TRUE) 

clusters <- st_read("https://opendata.dc.gov/datasets/neighborhood-clusters/explore?location=38.893798%2C-77.014470%2C11.83", 
                 quiet = TRUE) 
```


```{r}
MD_state_plane <- "+proj=lcc +lat_1=38.3 +lat_2=39.45 +lat_0=37.66666666666666 +lon_0=-77 +x_0=400000 +y_0=0 +ellps=GRS80 +units=m +no_def"

bshop <- bshop %>%
  st_transform(MD_state_plane)

library <- library %>%
  st_transform(MD_state_plane)

food-access <- food-access %>%
  st_transform(MD_state_plane)

clusters <- clusters %>%
  st_transform(MD_state_plane)
```
